oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (Office of Price Stabilization) - Programs 20 & 21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson radio show promoted by the Office of Price Stabilization. Labelled as program 20 and program 21. Original broadcast date unknown. Backed by his Brazos Valley Boys of Amos Hendrick on fiddle (mentioned), Johnny Manson on fiddle (mentioned), Harold Lee "Curly" Chalker on steel guitar (mentioned) and Billy Stewart on bass (presumably, not mentioned).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (00:39) Swing Wide Your Gate of Love (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (01:37) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (02:42) Shenandoah Valley Waltz (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (05:02) I Want to be Wanted by Someone Like You [featuring Johnny Manson vocals] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) --(06:39) Would You Care? (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (08:35) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (09:31) The Johnson Rag (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (11:28) The Sixty Minute Man (Hank Thompson and His Bravos Valley Boys) -- (13:48) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (14:43) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (15:21) Hangover Heart (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (17:43) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (19:00) She's a Girl Without Any Sweetheart (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (21:20) Wondering (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (24:20) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (25:13) Jessie Polka (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (26:40) New Roving Gambler (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (28:32) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
